org.eclipse.ecf.remoteservice.service
Interface IRemoteServiceService

All Superinterfaces:
org.eclipse.core.runtime.IAdaptable, IRemoteServiceContainerAdapter
public interface IRemoteServiceService
extends IRemoteServiceContainerAdapter

OSGI remote service interface. This interface should be registered by providers when they wish to expose remote service services to OSGI service clients.

Method Summary
